result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Christian T Greer

COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.

Defendant Christian T Greer not in court.  Attorney Joel Alan Mogren Aty in court for Christian T Greer.  
Prosecuting attorney Olivia Simmons in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm. 
Case set for scheduling conference.  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued forthwith. COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH WARRANT. Court takes no action as to bail.

Defendant Christian T Greer in court.  Attorney Joel Alan Mogren Aty in court for Christian T Greer.  Prosecuting attorney Jon R Josephsen Jr. in court for the State of Wisconsin. Deputy court clerk cmt. 
Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Davila, Branch 01. Arguments heard as to bail. Court orders bail remain as previously set. Court reminded defendant that the No Contact Order remains in full force and effect.
Scheduling conference scheduled for October 3, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Christian T Greer not in court.   No Assistant District Attorney Available appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
The Milwaukee County Sheriff's Office has cleared the active warrant, provided the next court date to the defendant, and requested the warrant be withdrawn with approval of Deputy Chief Judge Carl Ashley. MCSO advised defendant to appear in Room 221 of the Safety Building, in person, at 1:00 PM on 9/19/2022.
  Return on warrant scheduled for September 19, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
signed and filed.
Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued REMAND TO COMMISSIONER. Court takes no action on bail at this time.

Attorney Joel Alan Mogren in court.  Katrina Voge appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for Calendar Call.   Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued.

Attorney Joel Alan Mogren in court.  Katrina Voge appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case set for scheduling conference.  No appearance by the defendant.  Court ordered a bench warrant issued but stayed until the next court date.  Case adjourned to Br. 01.  Calendar call scheduled for August 11, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

All previously ordered conditions of bail remain.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT TO REPORT TO THE MILWAUKEE COUNTY JAIL (CJF) TO BE BOOKED AND RELEASED BY 5:00 P.M. ON 07-22-2022. IF THEY FAIL TO APPEAR, A BENCH WARRANT WILL BE ISSUED FOR THEIR ARREST.
Court ordered case adjourned for Scheduling Conference on 08-03-2022 at 09:00 AM, Branch 1.

Defendant Christian T Greer in court.  Michelle A. Grasso appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Court ordered arrest warrant withdrawn.  Recall issued.  Scheduling conference scheduled for August 3, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Attorney Joel Alan Mogren in court.  
Abby Rockendorf appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.
Hearing held via Zoom.  Matter set for status conference.  No appearance by the defendant.  Court ordered the bench warrant remain.

Defendant Christian T Greer in court with attorney Joel Alan Mogren.  
Nate Kristian McClure appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.
Hearing held via Zoom.  Pretrial conference held.  Atty. Mogren has just been appointed and has not received discovery and an offer.  Defendant was advised there is a warrant for his arrest and he must go to the CJF to be booked and released.  Case is adjourned to Br. 1.  This case will be heard via Zoom. Zoom meeting information provided to parties.  Status conference scheduled for June 29, 2022 at 10:30 am.
filed.  rmm
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.

Defendant Christian T Greer not in court.  Dax Odom appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Defendant failing to report to Criminal Justice facility on 5/11/22 at 5:00pm for Book and Release  , Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued.

Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued REMAND TO COMMISSIONER. Court further orders that bail is forfeited.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with MPV; Any CSL Plasma Center Location

DEFENDANT WAS ORDERED BY THE COURT TO REPORT TO THE MILWAUKEE COUNTY JAIL (CJF) TO BE BOOKED AND RELEASED BY 5:00 P.M. ON May 11, 2022. IF THEY FAIL TO APPEAR A BENCH WARRANT WILL BE ISSUED FOR THEIR ARREST.

Defendant is advised that this case is assigned to Judge Davila, Branch 1, in Room 615 in the Courthouse.
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant. Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20,right to challenge probable cause and to have complaint read until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance.  Defendant IS Public Defender eligible.  Defendant is ordered to provide the public defender's office with the next court date. The case is scheduled for a Pretrial Conference in Br 1.

Defendant Christian T Greer in court.  Kelly Hedge appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court ordered arrest warrant withdrawn.  Recall issued.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 1, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Arrest Warrant received from the D.A.'s office on filing date of Criminal Complaint.
